Text: MS EnewsletterHi There is some exciting BP MS news we want to let you know about Oops You may have recieved a blank enewsletter right before this one We identified and fixed the bug that caused the two enewsletters In the future you will recieve only one MS ENewsletter Topics Online Registration and Donations for BP MS Increased BP MS Pledge Amount in Training Ride Schedule New ENewsletter System Happy Holidays from the Lone Star Chapter Online Registration and Donations for BP MS Online registration and donations kicked off earlier than ever this year With an improved ecommerce engine developed by BP America we are happy to announce that over people have successfully registered You can too just follow this link msrideregisterasp Register early and save Early Bird Registration is only good until Increased BP MS Pledge Amount in For the minimum pledge is due to the increased costs associated with the BP MS and a commitment to maintain the safety and quality of the Bike Tour Although this might be an inconvenience or might limit some riders from participating in the BP MS we hope most riders realize the necessity and importance of this increase We encourage all riders to raise funds in support of research and programs benefiting people with multiple sclerosis MS of every you raise directly benefits people with MS Training Ride Schedule Were looking forward to a betterandbiggerthanever training ride series for Below is the current training ride schedule Check with the website for more details sponsor contact information and the latest updates msridetrainingridesasp BP MS Training Ride Schedule Sunday February Kingwood am Sunday February Katy am Sunday February TBD am Sunday February Magnolia am Sunday March Chappell Hill am Saturday March Austin am Sunday March Katy am New Enewsletter System Your enewsletter is now customizable by you Please visit the link at the bottom of this email to modify your subscription so you receive the enewsletters you want BP MS Bennigans MS or HEB MS Since subscriptions were mixed together before you are currently set to receive enewsletters for each of these rides Happy Holidays from the Lone Star Chapter Thank you for your support has been a banner growth year in fundraising and services for people with MS We are looking forward to a great Our offices will be closed from December to January The Lone Star Chapter staff will be back to assist you on January This email was sent to you because you are a member of the MS Enewsletter mailing list If you wish to remove yourself from the mailing list or modify your subscription please use the following link enewsletterindexcfmidemail
